scripts.folder:build: shx mkdir -p dist/css dist/js dist/bundle && shx cp -r src/** dist/
scripts.folder: npm run folder:clean -s && npm run folder:build -s
scripts.plugins:fa: shx mkdir dist/css/font-awesome && shx cp -r node_modules/font-awesome/css/ node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/ dist/css/font-awesome/
scripts.js: browserify dist/app/js/app.js -t [ babelify ] -d | exorcist dist/js/app.js.map > dist/js/app.js
scripts.postjs: uglifyjs dist/js/app.js -m -o dist/js/app.min.js --in-source-map dist/js/app.js.map --source-map dist/js/app.min.js.map --source-map-url app.min.js.map --source-map-root app/js
scripts.dev: npm run folder -s && npm run plugins -s && npm run css -s && npm run js -s
scripts.postprod:css: shx cat dist/tmp/*.css | cleancss -o dist/bundle/bundle.min.css --s0 && shx rm -r dist/tmp/
scripts.prod: npm run prod:css -s && npm run prod:js -s
scripts.build: npm run dev -s && npm run prod -s
